thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 5 of 7192
thread.title: Mark in Virginia
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Mark in Virginia

author: Mark in Virginia
title: Mark in Virginia
text: I have purchased from B&H both personally and business. Very good to do business with. Competitive pricing. Great advice personally when needed. Fast processing and shipping. They offer much more than just cameras and photo supplies. I have been a customer for many years. Still come back.
